fullText: This two-character biographical play about the basketball legends Magic Johnson and Larry Bird never quite takes flight, despite the athletic efforts of its two lead actors.
dtliExcerpt: This two-character biographical play about the basketball legends Magic Johnson and Larry Bird never quite takes flight, despite the athletic efforts of its two lead actors.
